body_html:
i do not know why the .pb file, which i download from the link below, convert into 8bit only take 4M, but my trained inception v1 model .pb file convert to 8bit takes 6.5M.

https://storage.googleapis.com/download.tensorflow.org/models/inception5h.zip

BTW, freeze_graph already move out unused nodes for prediction phase, is that right?

The .ckpt file size I get is 23.6M but .pb file size is 24M. it seems remove nothing.

dropout should not be in the prediction phase, but i can see dropout in error log.

body:
i do not know why the .pb file, which i download from the link below, convert into 8bit only take 4M, but my trained inception v1 model .pb file convert to 8bit takes 6.5M. 

https://storage.googleapis.com/download.tensorflow.org/models/inception5h.zip

BTW, **freeze_graph** already move out unused nodes for prediction phase, is that right? 

The .ckpt file size I get is 23.6M but .pb file size is 24M. it seems remove nothing.

dropout should not be in the prediction phase, but i can see dropout in error log.
